title: ZOMCHI 2-Piece Soap Bags with Gentle Roughness, Body Scrubbers for Shower, Soap Exfoliators
features: 2 Pieces of Gentle Soap Bags: Soft, nylon fibers create a gentle, effective exfoliation to help reveal your skin’s natural glow, suitable for those who want a gentle exfoliating scrub, especially for children and women. Exfoliating bar soap pouches measure the size 7.08in. x 3.93 in. each.

Gentle Exfoliating Soap Saver: Slip any soap bar inside the pouch and treat your skin to a deep, immaculately clean with this gentle exfoliating body scrubber. It helps remove dirt, oil & other impurities in your pores, leaving your skin feeling smooth & fresh.
Quick Foaming: Exfoliating soap pocket helps soap get rich lather in a short time just like loofah. Easy to foam and short foaming time.

Easy to Use: Gently massage your body in circular motions with the soap pouch to remove the dry and dead skin cells that block your pores. Do not be too rough or press too hard as it could irritate the skin.

No Wasting: Soap pocket saves a lot of soap in the long run and helps save your money. Put the leftover soap nub on the soap pocket together with new soap, and say bye-bye to waste. And your soap will never drop on the floor of the shower anymore with the soap saver pouch, enjoy happy bathing time.

Reliable Quality Support: ZOMCHI is committed to providing quality products. If there is any problem with the soap bags during normal use, you’re always welcome to contact us with any concerns. We’re here to offer timely assistance and ensure a smooth experience.
